title: Discard Untracked Changes
description: When working with Git, it's common to have untracked changes in your working directory. These changes are files that Git is not currently tracking. Sometimes, you may want to discard these changes and start fresh. In this challenge, you will learn how to discard all untracked changes to the current branch.

meta.title: Discard Untracked Changes in Git | Programming Tutorials
meta.description: Learn how to discard all untracked changes to the current branch in your Git repository. Improve your Git workflow and start fresh with this programming tutorial.
meta.keywords: Git, Git Tutorials, Discard Untracked Changes, Programming, Version Control
